verses.verse: And on the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> there was a wedding <S%G1062><s%> in Cana <S%G2580><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and the mother <S%G3384><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was there; <S%G1563><s%>
and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was invited, <S%G2564><s%> and His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> to the wedding. <S%G1062><s%>
And when the wine <S%G3631><s%> gave <S%G5302><s%> out, the mother <S%G3384><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "They have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> wine. <S%G3631><s%>"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "Woman, <S%G1135><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> do I have to do with you? My hour <S%G5610><s%> has <S%G2240><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> come. <S%G2240><s%>"
His mother <S%G3384><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the servants, <S%G1249><s%> "Whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G302><s%> He says <S%G3004><s%> to you, do <S%G4160><s%> it."

Now <S%G1161><s%> there were six <S%G1803><s%> stone <S%G3035><s%> waterpots <S%G5201><s%> set <S%G2749><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> for the Jewish <S%G2453><s%> custom of purification, <S%G2512><s%> containing <S%G5562><s%> twenty <S%G1417><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> thirty <S%G5140><s%> gallons <S%G3355><s%> each. <S%G303><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Fill <S%G1072><s%> the waterpots <S%G5201><s%> with water. <S%G5204><s%>" And they filled <S%G1072><s%> them up to the brim. <S%G507><s%>
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Draw <S%G501><s%> [some] out now, <S%G3568><s%> and take <S%G5342><s%> it to the headwaiter. <S%G755><s%>" And they took <S%G5342><s%> it [to him.]

And when <S%G5613><s%> the headwaiter <S%G755><s%> tasted <S%G1089><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> which had become <S%G1096><s%> wine, <S%G3631><s%> and did not know <S%G3609><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> it came <S%G1510><s%> from (but the servants <S%G1249><s%> who had drawn <S%G501><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> knew <S%G3609><s%>), the headwaiter <S%G755><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> the bridegroom, <S%G3566><s%>

and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> serves <S%G5087><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> first, <S%G4413><s%> and when <S%G3752><s%> [men] have drunk <S%G3184><s%> freely, <S%G3184><s%> [then] that which is poorer; <S%G1640><s%> you have kept <S%G5083><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> now. <S%G737><s%>"

This <S%G3778><s%> beginning <S%G746><s%> of [His] signs <S%G4592><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> in Cana <S%G2580><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and manifested <S%G5319><s%> His glory, <S%G1391><s%> and His disciples <S%G3101><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> in Him.

After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> He went <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to Capernaum, <S%G2746><s%> He and His mother, <S%G3384><s%> and [His] brothers, <S%G80><s%> and His disciples; <S%G3101><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> they stayed <S%G3306><s%> a few <S%G3756><s%> <S%G4183><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>
And the Passover <S%G3957><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> was at hand, <S%G1451><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

And He found <S%G2147><s%> in the temple <S%G2413><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who were selling <S%G4453><s%> oxen <S%G1016><s%> and sheep <S%G4263><s%> and doves, <S%G4058><s%> and the moneychangers <S%G2773><s%> seated. <S%G2521><s%>

And He made <S%G4160><s%> a scourge <S%G5416><s%> of cords, <S%G4979><s%> and drove <S%G1544><s%> [them] all <S%G3956><s%> out of the temple, <S%G2413><s%> with the sheep <S%G4263><s%> and the oxen; <S%G1016><s%> and He poured <S%G1632><s%> out the coins <S%G2772><s%> of the moneychangers, <S%G2855><s%> and overturned <S%G396><s%> their tables; <S%G5132><s%>

and to those <S%G3588><s%> who were selling <S%G4453><s%> the doves <S%G4058><s%> He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Take <S%G142><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> away; <S%G142><s%> stop <S%G3361><s%> making <S%G4160><s%> My Father's house <S%G3624><s%> a house <S%G3624><s%> of merchandise. <S%G1712><s%>"
His disciples <S%G3101><s%> remembered <S%G3403><s%> that it was written, <S%G1125><s%> "Zeal <S%G2205><s%> for Thy house <S%G3624><s%> will consume <S%G2719><s%> me."

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "What <S%G5101><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> do You show <S%G1166><s%> to us, seeing that You do <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Destroy <S%G3089><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> temple, <S%G3485><s%> and in three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> I will raise <S%G1453><s%> it up."

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "It took forty-six years <S%G2094><s%> to build <S%G3618><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> temple, <S%G3485><s%> and will You raise <S%G1453><s%> it up in three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>?"
But He was speaking <S%G3004><s%> of the temple <S%G3485><s%> of His body. <S%G4983><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> He was raised <S%G1453><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> His disciples <S%G3101><s%> remembered <S%G3403><s%> that He said <S%G3004><s%> this; <S%G3778><s%> and they believed <S%G4100><s%> the Scripture, <S%G1124><s%> and the word <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had spoken. <S%G3004><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> He was in Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> at the Passover, <S%G3957><s%> during <S%G1722><s%> the feast, <S%G1859><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> in His name, <S%G3686><s%> beholding <S%G2334><s%> His signs <S%G4592><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> He was doing. <S%G4160><s%>
But Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> on His part, <S%G846><s%> was not entrusting <S%G4100><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> to them, for He knew <S%G1097><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men, <S%G3956><s%>

and because <S%G3754><s%> He did not need <S%G5532><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> to bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> man <S%G444><s%> for He Himself <S%G846><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> was in man. <S%G444><s%>
